title: Oktoberfest & Collaboration Cigars
itunes:title: Oktoberfest & Collaboration Cigars
description:
It’s that time of year again. The leaves are falling, beer is flowing, and the cigars are smoking! It’s Oktoberfest today on The Cigar Authority, so join us in our celebration! In the first hour, we will spark up a cigar from the Care Package, Oktoberfest.

During the second hour, we will be smoking Nosotros and talking about collaboration cigars along with how the Cuban cigar market and how the restrictions that have been lifted will change the industry.

Join us for all the madness known as The Cigar Authority!
